title: Sun Ra - Sun Song & Sound Of Joy (1957) Delmark
description:
SUN RA - SUN SONG & SOUND OF JOY

SUN SONG
1. Brainville
2. Call For All Demons
3. Transition
4. Possession
5. Street Named Hell
6. Lullaby For Realville
7. Future
8. Swing A Little taste
9. New Horizons
10. Fall Off The Log
11. Sun Song

Recorded in 1957

It does not provide a personnel list but I know for sure that Sun Ra, John Gilmore and Julian Priester are in the band. The bass players last names are Green & Evans. Other last names that pop up in the liner notes are Young, Scales, Patrick, Hoyle, Barry and Herndon.

1990 Delmark Records

SOUND OF JOY
1. El Is A Sound Of Joy
2. Overtones Of China
3. Two Tones
4. Paradise
5. Planet Earth
6. Ankh
7. Saturn
8. Reflections In Blue
9. El Vicktor
10. As You Once Were
11. Dreams Come True

Sun Ra - piano, electric piano
Art Hoyle, Dave Young - trumpets
Julian Priester - trombone
Pat Patrick - alto & baritone sax
John Gilmore - tenor sax
Charles Davis - baritone sax
Victor Sproles - bass
William Cochran - drums
Jim Herndon - tympani, timbali
Clyde Williams - vocals

Recorded in November, 1957

1994 Delmark Records
